<Text: Shiso:  "crispa", also called shiso ( , from Japanese シソ ) is a variety of species "Perilla frutescens" of the genus "Perilla", belonging to the mint family, Lamiaceae.>

Text: Shiso:  Shiso is a perennial plant that may be cultivated as an annual in temperate climates, and occurs in both red- (or purple-) leaved and green forms.
